title: Looking for members for rank 5s
body:
Interested in doing rank 5s
Team currently has a jg main and a sup main
Add supermage101 if you're interested
Will accept any rank except bronze.

replies.body:
heyo, my ign is pickupartist, it'd be cool with playing with regulars, not sure i can commit to a serious schedule, but if "a guy to fill a role" is good with you, add me.
ok secondly, i started a game and left it recently, i had been hanging out for some league of legends for a couple weeks because my mouse had broken. i finally got off my ass and got a new one hours before a house party. i got my mouse again so i had to have a game of LoL, then the house party kicked off and i just couldn't stall enough time to finish the game i was in so i left. i cant create threads because i haven't posted enough times maybe, so forgive me for hijacking your thread.
add me if you want.
Add supermage101 in game, he can add you to the team
